Module org.example.miniproyecto_3
Package org.example.miniproyecto_3.Model

Class Cell

java.lang.Object
org.example.miniproyecto_3.Model.Cell
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Cell extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a cell in the game board.

Each cell holds its Cell.CellState, an optional Ship if one is placed there, and its Coordinate on the board. The cell can be empty, contain a ship, or have been hit/missed.

This class implements Serializable to allow saving/loading game state.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Cell

      public Cell(Coordinate cord)
      Constructs a new Cell with the given coordinate. Initializes the state to Cell.CellState.EMPTY and no ship.
      Parameters:
      cord - the coordinate of this cell on the board

      Returns:
      the coordinate of this cell

    • hit

      public void hit()
      Represents a shot fired at the cell.
      • If the cell contains a ship, it is marked as Cell.CellState.HIT and the ship is notified of the hit at this coordinate.
      • If the cell is empty, it is marked as Cell.CellState.MISS.
      Prints the result to the console.
